title: 08/25 Fantasy Football Podcast: Busts, Auctions, Podcast League!
description:
We've got a busy Friday show for you as Dave and Heath talk busts! Why does Heath think Jameis Winston could be overdrafted this year (5:00)? We also get some random thoughts from Adam about QBs (9:45), Round 2 RBs (12:40) and more before discussing Thursday's preseason games (18:30) ... Why Lamar Miller (32:20), Ameer Abdullah (34:00), Marshawn Lynch (37:40) and Leonard Fournette (39:40) could be busts ... Auction talk (45:30)! How to build a team, mistakes to avoid, nomination strategies and more. Then we announce the Podcast League contest winners (1:03:30) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
